object_name.value: Validate Change Request has Affected Documents fields filled

title.value: Used to validate Change Request affected documents all fields are filled.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
All required fields in Affected Documents tab are not updated. Update all the required fields before sending it to Workflow.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select * FROM cd_change_request WHERE r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and (any affected_doc_change_type = ' ' or any affected_doc_notify_user = ' '))
